label: Clause
comment: A distinct article or provision in a document, which requires compliance.

objectProperties.comment: A measurement associated with this document clause.
A period of time associated with this document clause.
Content, expressed as text, of this document clause.
The unique identifier of this document clause.
The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) for this document clause.

referencedBy.comment: A clause applicable to this specified certificate.
A document clause included in this document authentication.
